mapper.select: select bm.url, bm.id, um.username, bm.main_title, bm.preview_img_url, um.profile_img_url, bm.preview_txt, bm.create_date from border_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on(um.id = bm.id) order by create_date desc;

select bm.url, bm.id, um.username, bm.main_title, bm.preview_img_url, um.profile_img_url, bm.preview_txt, bm.create_date from border_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on(um.id = bm.id) where bm.create_date between date_add(now(), interval -1 day) and now() order by create_date desc;
